sentence.text: The genes with the highest number of hypermethylated CpG sites in INRG M tumors are transcription, RNA-templated, PCDHGA4, DLX5, and regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-positive regulation of T cell mediated cytotoxicity1.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
positive regulation of T cell mediated cytotoxicity

sentence.text: For validation, we used a negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated of independent tumors previously analyzed with the Illumina 27K methylation arrays, which confirmed the differentially methylated sites.
